summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department and to the Roy Street widening project, Phase I, 5th Avenue North to Queen Anne Avenue North, and Phase II, Queen Anne Avenue North to 3rd Avenue West and 3rd Avenue West from Roy Street to Mercer Street, amending Ordinance 101211 to provide for partial reimbursement of the Arterial City Street Fund from the Sewer Improvement Fund; and making an appropriation from the Sewer Improvement Fund therefor.
